name: Using Chef with Microsoft Azure
tagline: This book is your hands-on guide to infrastructure provisioning and configuration management in the cloud with Chefâ€™s open source, cross-platform toolset.
body:
### Welcome to Using Chef with Microsoft Azure.
This site has been created to keep you up to date with the latest tools and developments for "Using Chef with Microsoft Azure", a technical book by @stuartpreston, published by [Apress](http://www.apress.com/9781484214770)

## Timeline
May 2016 - the book has been proofed and we anticipate the release of the book by the end of the month!

## Where can I get it
### eBook
- The book can be downloaded as an eBook from http://www.apress.com/9781484214770 

### Paperback
- (US) http://www.amazon.com/Using-Microsoft-Azure-Stuart-Preston/dp/1484214773
- (UK) https://www.amazon.co.uk/Using-Microsoft-Azure-Stuart-Preston/dp/1484214773
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
